LanguageData.Beekeeping.label: beekeeping
LanguageData.Beekeeping.description: Allows you to build a bee hive where you can harvest honey.
LanguageData.Beekeeping.descriptionDiscovered: You can now build bee hives and start your honey production.\n\nNote: You'll need a queen bee to build a beehive. You can find them in hollowed trees or buy them from traders.
